version_description:
What's new:
- Now when you book parking, we'll extend your time to the maximum duration for the quoted price, at no additional cost.
- Need help? Now you can text the ParkWhiz Customer Support Team right from the app. 

What we fixed:
- Smoother map panning
- Using date picker no longer dismisses the date picker
- Performance and stability improvements

***ParkWhiz is constantly working to make parking easy for everyone. If you like what we're doing, please consider leaving a review for our app. Thank you!***

Bug fixes and improvements.

New in 5.2.1:
- Now when you book parking, we'll extend your time to the maximum duration for the quoted price, at no additional cost.
- Need help? Now you can text the ParkWhiz Customer Support Team right from the app. 

***ParkWhiz is constantly working to make parking easy for everyone. If you like what we're doing, please consider leaving a review for our app. Thank you!***

Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Bug fixes, performance enhancements, and some under-the-hood modernization.

Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

We're always making changes and improvements to the ParkWhiz app to make it faster and more reliable for you. Check back every update to see the latest features and fixes available.

- Bug fixes and performance enhancements
- This is the last ParkWhiz release that will support iOS 8.  Those on iOS 8 can continue to use this release, but for the best experience, update your phone to iOS 9 or higher or try our mobile website at www.parkwhiz.com.

*****
Like saving time and money on parking? Say so!
If you love ParkWhiz, please take a moment to review and rate our app. You drive us to create a better experience for everyone!
Be sure to give us a shout at support@parkwhiz.com if you have any suggestions or need help!
*****

We're always making changes and improvements to the ParkWhiz app to make it faster and more reliable for you. Check back every update to see the latest features and fixes available.

- Sign In / Sign Up with Google!
- Bug fixes and performance enhancements

We're always making changes and improvements to the ParkWhiz app to make it faster and more reliable for you. Check back every update to see the latest features and fixes available.

- New walkthrough when you first launch the app (existing users can launch this from the Menu by tapping on About Us)
- We're also giving some context around why we ask for certain permissions when you first launch the app and how it will improve your in-app experience
- Bug fixes and performance enhancements

*****

Be sure to give us a shout at help@parkwhiz.com if you have any suggestions or need help!
*****
Bug fixes and performance improvements

We're always making changes and improvements to the ParkWhiz app to make it faster and more reliable for you. Check back every update to see the latest features and fixes available.

- Parking passes are now saved offline. If you've had issues accessing your parking pass in areas with a weak internet connection, now you won't!
- Squashed some pesky bugs
- Enhanced our performance (only in the allowable, non-steroid way)

*****

Talk about listening to what our customers want! We’ve streamlined the app just the way they asked for a beautiful breezy experience with:

- All-in-one homescreen lets you book the way you want.
- Quickly book by address, where you’ve parked, or by map.
- One tap access to all your parking passes.
- New instant load map with easy pick pins.
- Easy date and time selection for greater accuracy.

*****
If you love ParkWhiz, please take a moment to review and rate our app. You drive us to create a better experience for everyone.
Be sure to give us a shout at support@parkwhiz.com if you have any suggestions or need help.
*****

6.0.1
- Local street names will now appear on the map
- Nickname your credit cards
- Under the hood performance tweaks
- Squashed a few pesky bugs

Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Improved navigation for finding and booking parking easily, along with handy parking facility recommendations. Enjoy!

We improve the ParkWhiz app with every release, making it even easier to find and book parking.
In this release: We've improved our credit card entry form to make adding a new card even simpler.

All feedback welcomed!  If you love ParkWhiz, please write us a review in the App Store.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements
Create and manage business profiles from the Account tab.  Link your ParkWhiz bookings to your Concur or Expensify account to make tracking business-related parking even easier.

Bug fixes and performance enhancements
Bug fixes and performance enhancements
Bug fixes and performance enhancements
We’re doing our best to make things easier for you. You can now rebook parking at your favorite garages in half the time!
Fixes an issue where selecting "book again" may preselect times that are in the past.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

We’ve added additional information about parking at airports, including shuttle times and how to get to/from the terminal.
Bug fixes:
- Corrects an issue scanning credit cards with a 4-digit security code
- Enhanced scannability for certain barcodes
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
NEW: extend your booking at select facilities! Meeting running long? Ordering dessert after dinner? No worries—add more parking time and stay longer!
Filters are here! Now you can limit your search results only to garages and lots with the amenities you want. Finding perfect parking just got even simpler.

Filters are here! Now you can limit your search results only to garages and lots with the amenities you want. Finding perfect parking just got even simpler.
v7.5.1 fixes a crash.
Shiny new sign in & sign up pages, plus the usual bug fixes and performance improvements.
Two places bugs don't belong: on your windshield and in our app. That's why we regularly update our app to keep everything under the hood running smoothly.

A few improvements to our sign up page to make things easier for our newest customers.
Also squashed a few bugs.  You know us: we had to get a few bug fixes in.

Introducing Siri Shortcuts!
Now you can get directions and access your parking pass just by asking Siri.  Click "Siri Shortcuts" in the More tab to get started.
***Siri Shortcuts requires iOS 12***
Bug fixes and performance improvements
We're moving north! We've added bookable locations in Toronto!

We're moving north! We've added bookable locations in Toronto!
v7.7.1 allows entry of Canadian postal codes.

We're moving north! We've added bookable locations in Toronto!
iOS 10 is *so* two years ago. That's why, with this latest version, updates won't be available for iOS 10 users. Upgrade to iOS 12 now to access all our newest features.
v7.7.2 fixes a crash that can occur when purchasing with a slow network connection.
We're testing out a new feature that lets you pay with ParkWhiz even when you haven't booked parking in advance! Now available at select facilities in Chicago, San Francisco, LA, and DC.

We're testing out a new feature that lets you pay with ParkWhiz even when you haven't booked parking in advance! Now available at select facilities in Chicago, San Francisco, LA, and DC.
v7.8.1 fixes a crash that occurs after a push notification.

We're testing out a new feature that lets you pay with ParkWhiz even when you haven't booked parking in advance! Now available at select facilities in Chicago, San Francisco, LA, and DC.
v7.8.2 fixes an error when using Siri Shortcuts.

We're testing out a new feature that lets you pay with ParkWhiz even when you haven't booked parking in advance! Now available at select facilities in Chicago, San Francisco, LA, and DC.
v7.8.3 includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

We're testing out a new feature that lets you pay with ParkWhiz even when you haven't booked parking in advance! Now available at select facilities in Chicago, San Francisco, LA, and DC.
v7.8.4 includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

We're testing out a new feature that lets you pay with ParkWhiz even when you haven't booked parking in advance! Now available at select facilities in Chicago, San Francisco, LA, and DC.
v7.8.5 brings back estimated walking time and path, plus includes bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Fewer taps? You got it! Introducing a handy shortcut that lets you access your parking pass and more right from the home screen.
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Did you know ParkWhiz has monthly reserved parking too?  When you open the app, click the link to call and find monthly parking.
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
We’ve made it easier for our guest users to extend their bookings.  We've also continued to make our usual bug fixes and performance enhancements, as well.
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

Now you've got two methods to pay at select facilities without booking ahead!

• Method 1 – Pull a ticket when you arrive and scan it with the app. Insert it at the gate when you leave and the app pays your ticket.
• NEW! Method 2 – Park first, then select your desired rate in the app. Extend your time or end early as needed, right from your phone.

We've added a section to the home screen to help you find where you can try these methods nearby.
Bug fixes and performance improvements
We've added the ability to validate your parking at selected locations in Washington, D.C.

If you're in the Chicago or Washington, D.C. area, be sure to check out our new park then pay feature available at select locations. Additionally, we're doing our best to keep our app as tidy as possible for you by squashing any bugs we come across.
We've added events directly within our search bar to let you park faster, get on your way and started with what you'd really rather be doing!
Bug fixes and enhancements
We've made it easier to find your happy space by making sure we show you the best possible location.
We're continually making our app faster and better to make sure the only thing you have to worry about is what you're going to do without all the stress parking used to cause.
We've given our checkout page a makeover by giving it a fresh, cool, new look as well as highlighting the items that are most valuable to you, our customers.
Bug fixes and enhancements
Bug fixes and enhancements.
Bug fixes and enhancements.
We've added the ability to send your parking pass to others in the event that you are unable to use it.
Bug fixes and enhancements
Bug fixes and enhancements
Bug fixes and enhancements

You'll now be able to get more details about your parking options. This update will help you:

See exact time and duration options available before you book parking
Select the best rate for your needs
Bug fixes and enhancements.
Bug fixes and enhancements for improved app performance.

This version includes feature upgrades that let users gain access to parking facilities via their phone's Bluetooth technology. No need to pull or scan a ticket. Bluetooth entry is currently available in select locations only. As well, we've added the ability to search for Park Then Pay locations.

This version includes feature upgrades that lets you gain access to parking facilities via your phone's Bluetooth technology. Open the gate directly from the parking pass on your device. 

Bluetooth entry is currently only available in select locations.
This release includes bug fixes and feature enhancements to improve the parking experience. Users in select cities will now be able to filter their parking search to find park then pay facilities.
This release includes bug fixes and enhancements to improve app performance. Bluetooth capabilities continue to be released for select locations
This release includes enhancements and feature updates. Users can now see when a pass can or can not be cancelled.
We're constantly updating our app to reduce the stress of parking. We added the ability for you to create an account with your Apple ID so you no longer have to verify an email or enter a password.
We've updated our event passes to let you know if your event has been postponed and has yet to be rescheduled. We'll reschedule your parking as soon as we know the new date of the event.
We've made it that much easier to get our app and use it by adding the ability to get directly where you can pay by tapping or scanning our new signs, available at select locations.
We've added to the many ways to park then pay. Enjoy extra flexibility by using a QR code to enter at select locations without worrying how much time you need.
You can now tap one of our signs and pay for your parking immediately and be on your way.
We're continuing to add several new locations to our network of parking facilities as well as increasing the performance of the app.
Performance improvements and bug fixes
We've added the ability for monthly users to use ParkWhiz to enter and exit at select locations.
We’ve expanded our coupon offerings and made monthly parking easier in selected locations.
Performance enhancements and bug fixes
Bug fixes and enhancements
We've made added some features to our on site app clip experience like credit card payments and extension so you can stop worrying about parking and worry about getting on with your day.
